name: Lesson
storyline:
Lidoriki region is a small village which is abandoned since 1980 and the villagers disappeared. 
 
A year since then, the houses began to flood as the water level rose a little higher. There was no one there so the flood destroyed the buildings. 
 
The only building that was not demolished it was the school because it was higher than the other buildings. Thousands of rumours about this school was heard all over Greece, but no one ever had the guts to go and find the truth. Ethan Sawn, a researcher sacraments, in November 2016, heard about the place and he decided to go and do some research. 
 
As a manager in his office had let Rick Asel, his best friend, who after spending a week and Ethan did not appear, 
 
he went to find him. But Rick didn't know what was going on there...
summary: Take a lesson the the fear!
